Everything else is fine! You can go for it!

Battery: It has less battery than M2 pro & so it drains earlier ...
Complete value for money.

* Great Battery backup.
* Camera is best in class.
* Build quality is really good.
Really can't see any cons. 100% recommend.

3. Side fingerprint sensor and face unlock is fast and convenient. The fingerprint scanner works instanly and it is very reliable as well...face unlock too is vey nice.

Surpringly one of the best performance in mid range mobile. In past I was using Redmi 5 and Realme 2 pro but didn't get such a smooth OS and UI. Undoubtedly this mobile is much better than Realme and MI in mid range mobile segment. The USP of this product is the look and feel which I never found in mid range product. 100% recommend product.

Best phone for students who study online. Big battery give you best backup. BackCamera Is very Good but front is little fake . Design is awesome . Display is better than Redmi and realme phone as compare to this price range . HD+ display but it can play 2k,4k through mx player . Dts sound system is Good for speaker but it is average when you use earphone . So many swipe gesture features is amazing and also the XOS is very smooth . Punchh hole display camera is latest 2020 model .overall best ...
Just design is good.
Camera is not upto the mark as compared to Realme/ Redmi device at the same price.
Battery is decent.
Who wants a good-looking device can go for Infinix Hot 9.
But Who wants a good camera and good performance can go for another devices.
Stunning battery life, nice camera and larger display.  That's what you can expect from Infinix Hot 9. You can't expect best performance.

Overview: Great product with probably best specs at this price point. Decent camera, great looks, great battery and charging.
Design:Looks great and classy due to gorilla glass at back. camera bump is slightly bigger but this issue can fixed by using cover. Phone is slightly bigger.

Display:It has 6.67inch ips lcs display. Viewing angles are good has Decent brightness. There is screen bleeding around camera cutout and edges of display but not a big deal every lcd djisplay has screen bleedin...

Display: im the one who used Samsung s7 sAmoled 551ppi QHD+ display for 3 yrs. So this kinda a let down for me. Contrast level is good & colors are well calibrated but still u can feel a downgrade if u have used a AMOLED panel before. & 90hz would have been greatest. I think faster refresh rate boomed amoled growth in India, every phone around 15k-20k was coming with amoled & then high refresh rate arrived with oneplus & all company started giving lcd with 90/120hz I will still prefer sAmoled...
GREAT 💥 PHONE FROM POCO RECOMMENDED TO EVERYONE WHO WANT TO PURCHASE IT

Since i want camera phone and this is the best camera phone. 120 hz refreshing rate i dont whether it works or not. But overall phone is very good. I love camera. 6 ram with 128 gb is best because 64 mp camera pic occupied 31 mb per photo and internal memory will get full very fast. Hybrid sim slot is disappointed. Audio quality in bluetooth headset is super. Charging is very faster than you expectations. Good deal for game lover. Very confused between Realme 6 pro vs Poco X2 but finally deci...
Pros-

I can surely say that it is really value for money phone....if u are looking for awesome camera, battery and performance just go for it without any doubt also charger is enough fast.i also used many phone with IPS LCD display but this one i can say one word.....great.
Cons- i must say that it is little heavier side and also no led notification light enabled by developers while it has that i hope they will fix it next ota update.

Sony IMX 686 sensor is really flagship level camera sensor. Captured pitch dark night sky with google camera night sight (Astrophotography) mode and got very impressive results which can easily beat a DSLR camera. The stars captured in image were so fade in reality that they were not even visible to naked eyes.
Snapdragon 730G SOC is powerful enough to handle the most graphics intensive operations. Played few games capable of achieving 120 fps and they were easily handled by this processor....

Overview: Great product with probably best specs at this price point. Decent camera, great looks, great battery and charging.
Design:Looks great and classy due to gorilla glass at back. camera bump is slightly bigger but this issue can fixed by using cover. Phone is slightly bigger.

Display:It has 6.67inch ips lcs display. Viewing angles are good has Decent brightness. There is screen bleeding around camera cutout and edges of display but not a big deal every lcd djisplay has screen bleedin...

Display: im the one who used Samsung s7 sAmoled 551ppi QHD+ display for 3 yrs. So this kinda a let down for me. Contrast level is good & colors are well calibrated but still u can feel a downgrade if u have used a AMOLED panel before. & 90hz would have been greatest. I think faster refresh rate boomed amoled growth in India, every phone around 15k-20k was coming with amoled & then high refresh rate arrived with oneplus & all company started giving lcd with 90/120hz I will still prefer sAmoled...

Overall this phone will never disappoint with its performance.

Mobile is very handy. Packed with good performances and nice camera. This is my first iPhone. Very good experience with Apple. Battery is worst. I am hardly getting 5 hours screen on time.  Positive thing is I came to know how many hours I was spending on my mobile. Because of poor battery now I am only using mobile for 4 hours a day.

Let's face it. The main reason you're even considering this is because you want a compact phone that doesn't compromise on power. Getting OS updates for another 4-5 years, with a decent camera, waterproofing and wireless charging is just an added advantage.
There's a few things it could've done better:
1. Battery is barely adequate for a day of moderate usage.
2. The bezels could have been reduced to have more screen to body ratio.
3. Night mode for the camera was a software feature that ...
One word.. beautiful iphone ❤️ premium feel
Just go for it without any doubt. Superb camera, handy, white color is soo good.
This phone is for someone who don't like big screen phones.
Everything is fine of this mobile except battery.
Battery consumption at 8-10% Brightness in
Video call : almost 4% reduction for every 5-6 mins.
Phone call : almost 1% reduction for every 4-5 mins.
Which seems to be bit faster consumption. First iPhone I’m using. I’m not sure about regular battery consumption rate. But this doesn’t look nice to me.

Keep the battery aside and I don’t see any other reason why you shouldn’t buy it. It’s super fast, has an awesome pair of camera, punchy speaker, good looks, beautiful screen, perfect size and an amazing user experience. Everything about this phone is no nonsense.

Coming to battery, I was aware it was less but I didn’t care because for my casual usage, it easily lasts 24hours. It easily gives an onscreen time of 4 hours per day and if you are using your phone for more than that, you know you...

I definitely give a thumbs up to realme for such great product.

reviews: Truly top class design and phenomenal performance. I have been using it from last 2-3 days and this really beats all other competitors in this segment. I have shifted to realme from xiaomi and this has been a great choice overall. Realme C2 handles all the daily tasks very efficiently and is even great for multitasking. One thing is for sure, the optimization and RAM management has been done really well and I have fallen in love with this powerful and beautiful beast.
thanx to flipkart ... great deal.. this phone is very nice .. performance ,battery camera ,and very easy to handle.. mst buy???
nice phone performance is really good and battery quality awesome 👻👻😧😧 and pubg playing vary smooth 😍 😍 i like it this phone

What an amazing device. The diamond cut pattern looks amazing. It has textured finish(matt feel). So it gives you perfect grip to hold it. It will rarely slip from your hand. The display is gorgeous. Its bright and vibrant. You will surely be amazed on the first boot itself. Surprisingly the device doesn't feel heavy though it has massive 4000mah battery. As usual photos are coming nice and sharp. In this budget you really can't complain about it. Color OS 6.0 is much much better than its pre...

My honest opinion would that you cannot get anything better than this in this price range. The back camera and battery performance is totally awesome, screen quality is decent considering the price point and as you all know the design is so beautiful that it totally takes the points away from its competitors. I definitely give a thumbs up to realme for such great product.

Super product and the battery performance is great. I am using this device with a heavy multitasking but it is easily last more than a day with some battery left. The black color with a daimond design at the back is so appealing that you can go for it blindfolded. truely a masterpiece from realme in the budget segment. Realme Rocks!

Total Value for money... best phone at the price.. looks really premium and very good spec and configuration... very good camera quality and performance... very satified... and thank you flipkart for veey quick and fast delivery and packing was really good.. must go for this for budget smartphone
You are buying to your  Father or mother u can trust this one
portrait photos worth this price decent..
not a gaming phone just normal day by day usage phone
pros:
good battery backup and 2A charger is very good charging better compare to other 3000 mah battery oppo devise s..pre applied screen filim .. buy a tempered glass with handset
looking cute diamond black perfect
don't worry about slippery..gripping is perfect
cons: charging time phone slightly heatup..
camera more timin...

I got it at the price of 6219 and to be Frank the camera quality is far better than the MI series. What I really liked was even if you use it for a longer time playing games and Al the phone doesn't heat. However u might require a back case since its quite slippery. Battery backup and display's are good.
Realme c2 is a budget phone
It’s looks is pretty
Size of this phone is Oky
Camera is good in it’s range
Battery life is awesome
Performance also good in it’s range
I am a realme lover

Overall, the screen of the Redmi 8 is pretty good considering its a sub-Rs 10,000 price phone. Besides being a bright screen it is also bigger compared to what we saw in earlier comparable Redmi phones. The Redmi 8 comes with a 6.22-inch HD+ IPS display. It has screen resolution of 1520x720 pixels.
Battery backup is not good like 5000 mh battery backup but not good.
Otherwise mobile is very good and fabulous and value of money comparison other handset is too good.
I am spellbound after seeing this.What a value of money ... love you MI 🎊😍😘 ...and also the package delivery service and packing was quite good .
Awesome mobile. I've purchased it for my Mom🥰... She is very happy with this SURPRISE... Guys don't take any Option and make it as a Selection... Wonderful Mobile 🤩
Very good phone...nice display and  long battery life ,, good camera, 4gb Ram, large storage... decent price... highly recommend

Awesom product. From my point of view, redmi 8 is the only must buy mobile phone for moderate budget people.
The battery, display, and ram & rom performs well. The speaker has huge & crystal clear voice, and the look is so hot & attractive that this phone dominates in front of other high budget phones.
As such all color varients are better, but I own the Emerald green varient which is the best, awesome & appreciated & praised by all, whoever see it.

Great phone in this prize.camera,display,ram,memory, battery & all things about this phone is superb ..btt its not a gaming phone bcoz of its prossesser.if u dont play heavy games like pubg then u should go for it
Everything in this phone is awesome
Battery is superb
Screen is wide and long
Camera qualities in  this price range is awesome. You will able to capture photos in low light because you will get low light sensor

Notification light also turn on  when you will charge it

Surpringly one of the best performance in mid range mobile. In past I was using Redmi 5 and Realme 2 pro but didn't get such a smooth OS and UI. Undoubtedly this mobile is much better than Realme and MI in mid range mobile segment. The USP of this product is the look and feel which I never found in mid range product. 100% recommend product.

Best phone for students who study online. Big battery give you best backup. BackCamera Is very Good but front is little fake . Design is awesome . Display is better than Redmi and realme phone as compare to this price range . HD+ display but it can play 2k,4k through mx player . Dts sound system is Good for speaker but it is average when you use earphone . So many swipe gesture features is amazing and also the XOS is very smooth . Punchh hole display camera is latest 2020 model .overall best ...
Just design is good.
Camera is not upto the mark as compared to Realme/ Redmi device at the same price.
Battery is decent.
Who wants a good-looking device can go for Infinix Hot 9.
But Who wants a good camera and good performance can go for another devices.
Stunning battery life, nice camera and larger display.  That's what you can expect from Infinix Hot 9. You can't expect best performance.

Hi,

The pop up 16 MP front camera performs well enough and it makes a good full display without any punch holes or notches.
Display is good enough even though not as much as AMOLED.
Overall this phone will never disappoint with its performance.

Mobile is very handy. Packed with good performances and nice camera. This is my first iPhone. Very good experience with Apple. Battery is worst. I am hardly getting 5 hours screen on time.  Positive thing is I came to know how many hours I was spending on my mobile. Because of poor battery now I am only using mobile for 4 hours a day.

Let's face it. The main reason you're even considering this is because you want a compact phone that doesn't compromise on power. Getting OS updates for another 4-5 years, with a decent camera, waterproofing and wireless charging is just an added advantage.
There's a few things it could've done better:
1. Battery is barely adequate for a day of moderate usage.
2. The bezels could have been reduced to have more screen to body ratio.
3. Night mode for the camera was a software feature that ...
One word.. beautiful iphone ❤️ premium feel
Just go for it without any doubt. Superb camera, handy, white color is soo good.
This phone is for someone who don't like big screen phones.
Everything is fine of this mobile except battery.
Battery consumption at 8-10% Brightness in
Video call : almost 4% reduction for every 5-6 mins.
Phone call : almost 1% reduction for every 4-5 mins.
Which seems to be bit faster consumption. First iPhone I’m using. I’m not sure about regular battery consumption rate. But this doesn’t look nice to me.

Keep the battery aside and I don’t see any other reason why you shouldn’t buy it. It’s super fast, has an awesome pair of camera, punchy speaker, good looks, beautiful screen, perfect size and an amazing user experience. Everything about this phone is no nonsense.

Coming to battery, I was aware it was less but I didn’t care because for my casual usage, it easily lasts 24hours. It easily gives an onscreen time of 4 hours per day and if you are using your phone for more than that, you know you...
Like It, Apple SE very nice and handy mobile, we can use it by single hand, like it too much if you are going single handy mobile you can go with Apple SE 2020 without any hesitation.

Overall it's the same iPhone 6 with an A13 chip and the generation updates a smartphone can get in 2020.

reviews: Awesome this phone this price lovely phone love you Motorola verry good

Good value for money phone, decent display as it has around 200ppi only, and it's 720p resolution. Camera is okay, very poor in low light. Battery is great, screen on time is large. Processor performance is average, definitely not useful for gaming.
Great phone to gift to your parents / elderly.
Also compare realme Narzo 10A, Samsung M10, (E01 upcoming), Nokia 2.3 with Moto G8 power lite.
I found moto good phone overall, atleast till now.
The phone is massive I like the phone build quality is good the camera is average but the battery life is excellent it's big in size screen phone under 9000/-
The phone comes with screen guard and transparent cover case
It has its big battery e of 5000 m a h and its need more time to charge 0-100 aap to 2 hours 45 minutes or 3 hours by it stock charger.
Value for money only if you are not looking for a gaming centric phone. The build us nice, you get no bloatware at all. Basically it's a pretty nice phone at this price.
PS. This is a great phone at this price for your father or mother rather than yourself.

Camera very good in day light but in night, camera is very poor , performance is good , display is good, finger print sensor is amazing , stylish look and design , overall phone is very good for parents and low mobile users not for gamers
The phone is excellent for normal users and not at all for gamers.
While playing pubg with smooth and medium frame rate, it's having so much lag, can barely kill someone
The 5000mah battery is enough for 2 days with moderate usage of youtube, fb, etc.
The camera is not good.
The picture have noise even if taken in daylight.
Low light photos are worse, it's like a water paint picture.
VOLTE AND VOWIFI is working perfectly with jio network
It's don't know if it's having dual VOLTE, not tested....
I am using it for 1 month  and it is value for money for daily use , ok
One thing is that it'll last long if you don't give it pressure by running high graphics demanding game or trying to render 4K videos !
I'll highly recommend it to others if you want to buy it for daily use , or gifting it to some of your dad or mom
Perhaps the best thing is it's stock android which is bloatware free ,that makes your experience totally awesome ❤️ #moto

Mobile is very handy. Packed with good performances and nice camera. This is my first iPhone. Very good experience with Apple. Battery is worst. I am hardly getting 5 hours screen on time.  Positive thing is I came to know how many hours I was spending on my mobile. Because of poor battery now I am only using mobile for 4 hours a day.

Let's face it. The main reason you're even considering this is because you want a compact phone that doesn't compromise on power. Getting OS updates for another 4-5 years, with a decent camera, waterproofing and wireless charging is just an added advantage.
There's a few things it could've done better:
1. Battery is barely adequate for a day of moderate usage.
2. The bezels could have been reduced to have more screen to body ratio.
3. Night mode for the camera was a software feature that ...
One word.. beautiful iphone ❤️ premium feel
Just go for it without any doubt. Superb camera, handy, white color is soo good.
This phone is for someone who don't like big screen phones.
Everything is fine of this mobile except battery.
Battery consumption at 8-10% Brightness in
Video call : almost 4% reduction for every 5-6 mins.
Phone call : almost 1% reduction for every 4-5 mins.
Which seems to be bit faster consumption. First iPhone I’m using. I’m not sure about regular battery consumption rate. But this doesn’t look nice to me.

Keep the battery aside and I don’t see any other reason why you shouldn’t buy it. It’s super fast, has an awesome pair of camera, punchy speaker, good looks, beautiful screen, perfect size and an amazing user experience. Everything about this phone is no nonsense.

Coming to battery, I was aware it was less but I didn’t care because for my casual usage, it easily lasts 24hours. It easily gives an onscreen time of 4 hours per day and if you are using your phone for more than that, you know you...
Like It, Apple SE very nice and handy mobile, we can use it by single hand, like it too much if you are going single handy mobile you can go with Apple SE 2020 without any hesitation.

Overall it's the same iPhone 6 with an A13 chip and the generation updates a smartphone can get in 2020.

Also it has lots of safety features. Two things which might not be important but is essential is that it removes and merges duplicate contacts unlike Xiaomi Or iphones....

reviews: Bought this phone for sister for her online studies.Let me tell you honestly that I didnt heard the brand Tecno earlier(My bad).Due to that I didnt expect much from it. But it suprised me😊. This device is the best entry level smartphone with extreme features available now(Period).
The things I love about this device.
1. 5000 Mah battery
2. Fast Fingerprint scanner. (At this rate)
3. Selfie camera with front flash
4. Huge display
5. Decent daylight photography.
6. Unique audio sharing fea...
Cons:
1. Touch is unresponsive on few places, not smooth at times.
2. Youtube don't look smooth on potrait mode, have to watch @ 720p + resolution
3. Camera is below average, it may not satisfy you. You have to be content with the clarity.
4. Video camera is much worse.
5. Battery may last a day on heavy usage.
6. It's just a new look of Spark Go Plus with few modifications.
7. 2gb ram might slow down the phone
8. Lot of bloatware.
9. Not for heavy users who look for everything best.
In this prize range phone is good
But camera is not good
Battery performance is good
Allover phone is average 👍👍

It has fabulous display, good battery (at least better than my iPhone), has a very good sound quality and comes with myriad of features in such low budget.
Also it has lots of safety features. Two things which might not be important but is essential is that it removes and merges duplicate contacts unlike Xiaomi Or iphones....

Ok...this is literally the best phone in the segment. Battery is insane, performance/gaming is fantastic, cameras are incredible and overall this phone is just amazing value for money. Although the POCO X2 has a bigger battery than this phone, it's 120hz display sucks alot of power and drains is quicker so battery is better on this phone.....
Detailed Review - I have Been Using this phone from last 4 Days
Excellent Delivery By Flipkart Less Than 24Hrs
Pros - 1.  Battery Lasts More Than 46Hrs for Heavy Usage Like Call, FB, Twitter, Live TV Etc
2. Performance - 5 Star - Not even a single second Lag
3. Camera -4.5 Star - A bit Photo Blurr of 64 MP Camera, Else than that Every Thing Is Perfect.
4. UI - Same Like Apple iPhone Controls are Fascinating. Much Better Than Color OS.
Cons - Till Date NO, Will Update Soon
I think it is best for it's price
The camera is awesome
The SD 720G is very thermal and battery efficient
It gives an excellent performance while gaming
I think the diaplay is not such great, the colours in the diaplay is not so much accurate like poco x2, but the 90 hetz display is awesome

If I talk about the camera quality, it is also best in it's price range. I think realme had not added the camera sensors just to increase the count specially the 12mp telephoto sensor is more acceptab...

reviews: Bought this phone for sister for her online studies.Let me tell you honestly that I didnt heard the brand Tecno earlier(My bad).Due to that I didnt expect much from it. But it suprised me😊. This device is the best entry level smartphone with extreme features available now(Period).
The things I love about this device.
1. 5000 Mah battery
2. Fast Fingerprint scanner. (At this rate)
3. Selfie camera with front flash
4. Huge display
5. Decent daylight photography.
6. Unique audio sharing fea...
Cons:
1. Touch is unresponsive on few places, not smooth at times.
2. Youtube don't look smooth on potrait mode, have to watch @ 720p + resolution
3. Camera is below average, it may not satisfy you. You have to be content with the clarity.
4. Video camera is much worse.
5. Battery may last a day on heavy usage.
6. It's just a new look of Spark Go Plus with few modifications.
7. 2gb ram might slow down the phone
8. Lot of bloatware.
9. Not for heavy users who look for everything best.
In this prize range phone is good
But camera is not good
Battery performance is good
Allover phone is average 👍👍
Nice one

It was so bad I sold the phone just 2 days after buying it. But then I decided to give this phone a go and has it surprised me. I went for 6+64 gb version in green color. Let me tell you a bit more about my experiences with the phone in last 4 days.
Pros:
1. Battery: I was hoping to get 6-7 hours of screen on time (SOT)...

Trust me guys it is a superb smartphone.

Battery consumption at 8-10% Brightness in

Phone call : almost 1% reduction for every 4-5 mins.

Keep the battery aside and I don’t see any other reason why you shouldn’t buy it. It’s super fast, has an awesome pair of camera, punchy speaker, good looks, beautiful screen, perfect size and an amazing user experience. Everything about this phone is no nonsense.

reviews: Reviewing this after 2 months usage - I'll come straight to the points:
Major PRO's:
> Excellent Camera (in Daylight - Awesome, Fascinating / Night - Keep your hand steady/use tripod, you'll get outstanding images!!)
> SONY IMX 586 Sensor Never disappoints!
> Great display (Punchier colors, Black is deep black and it's smooth)
> DEDICATED Micro SD Card Slot (Dual SIM - Jio 4G & Airtel 4G and 128 GB Memory card I'm using, no lagging)
> Snapdragon 712 AIE - Gaming & other experiences are SMO...
Good Camera 👌👌
Good Battery Life ( About 8 hours of SOT with gaming (Pubg 2 hrs))
Vocc Charging is Amazing only take 1 hr to full charge
I think build Quality is very low After 1 month Usage my phone slightly bended ( I don't no how this happened )
Gaming Is Good ( Play Pubg in Smooth - Ultra , HD - High , No HDR or Extreme Support)
Colors Os is Superb
Over all It is a good smartphone  Value Of Money
Don't think much go for it.!!!!!!
Most Affordable the best smartphone
Interms of Looks.
Interns of performance
Best in class camera.
Best in class display.
Best call receiving .
Best game response.
Very important for me is Triple Camera setup.
Total awesome experience .
Tanks realms team but work on OS.
Final Verdict::Just awesome smartphone.

Awesome Phone, attractive design, damdar performance, super camera, superfast fingerprint and face unlock. I really love it. but i dont like colorOS basic fonts and looks. stock android UI is better then ColorOS UI. Need to update UI graphics and fonts.
My fav #realme_5_pro &
Clicked using #Asus_Zenfone_Max_Pro_M1

Just brought the Crystal Green baby home! :D This is by far the best color realme has ever chosen to work on! Absolutely amazing, you'll know when you lay eyes on it! Be it the 48MP quad camera lenses, be it the SD712 processor or VOOC 3.0 charger, it's THE best smartphone I am looking for!

this phone is superb in it's price slot. wide angle photos and night scape is great, slo mo and macro is okay. zoom is superb , touch is good, sound is great, speed is great, over all awesome  package in 15k range phone, best phone to buy. Recommend Highly.
the mobile is up to the mark and great value for money ......camera is excellent and vooc charger is great .....I strongly recommend this mobile in this price range

After having used a flagship phone for more than 2 years, I wasn't sure if I would be able to live with a budget phone. My apprehensions were almost proved true by the Mi A3. It was so bad I sold the phone just 2 days after buying it. But then I decided to give this phone a go and has it surprised me. I went for 6+64 gb version in green color. Let me tell you a bit more about my experiences with the phone in last 4 days.
Pros:
1. Battery: I was hoping to get 6-7 hours of screen on time (SOT)...
Smooth experience with fast transitions and satisfying camera quality in a budget deal. Macro shots are unbelievable. It is gorgeous in its look and feels premium in hands. Liked the phone extremely
Superb phone fantastic camera awesome battery life and quick charge is very useful
